channel.title: Artist Contest
channel.description:
Hey, what's up? I'm Steven. Came into some money, and thought I'd have a little contest. The WINNER will recieve a RuneScape 3 month membership card. The contest is simple: Make the best picture out of all the other entries, and WIN! All MoparScape rules apply: No nudity; No sexual content; No gang signs; No curse words; Etc.. You have til the end of the month! Judges are needed. (P.S. if MoparScape staff do not like this. I will take it down imediately.)
- Steven
[b]EDIT: (Suggested into action) You can only use "MicroSoft" paint... Put in as much detail as possible; make it unique or however you spell that.

item.title: Artist Contest
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Wait, aren’t you supposed to banned for something else?

Yes, yes you are.

Read full topic

item.title: Artist Contest
item.dc:creator: @Steven2 Steven™
item.description:
@Steven2 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:11, topic:413078”][quote author=Steven™ link=topic=514551.msg3735373#msg3735373 date=1314917493]

Seems pointless. Should have some limits…

I put in limits. No nudity; No sexual content; No curse words; No gang signs; Etc… It’s too see who in the MoparScape community is the greatest artist.
[/quote]Yeah but the problem is…Some stuff can look better then other things, Like something simple mite be better then something with a lot of detail. There is so many things to judge on that having so open it would be hard to.[/quote]
i fixed the topic.

Read full topic

item.description:

Seems pointless. Should have some limits…

I put in limits. No nudity; No sexual content; No curse words; No gang signs; Etc… It’s too see who in the MoparScape community is the greatest artist.
[/quote]

Cole no debate.[/quote]
There’s a lot of people better than me on MSCP. IMHO I’m an amateur in comparison.

item.title: Artist Contest
item.dc:creator: @Steven2 Steven™
item.description:
@Steven2 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:4, topic:413078”][quote author=Steven™ link=topic=514551.msg3735343#msg3735343 date=1314916513]

Make it a real challenge. And add some proof. Time stamp of the card, and you can only use MS paint.

What do you mean “Time Stamp of the card”?
[/quote]
Show a pic of the card and then a piece of paper next to it with your username and the date.[/quote]
Will do! Just one problem. I haven’t bought it yet. My paycheck isn’t til tomorrow. I’m getting a bonus.

Read full topic
